title: Engineering, Construction & Project Management | Bechtel
description: Learn why Bechtel is one of the most respected engineering, construction, and project management companies in the world.
cleaned_text: Extraordinary teams building inspiring projects. Bechtel helps customers deliver projects of purpose that create a lasting positive legacy. These projects create jobs and grow economies; improve the resiliency of the world's infrastructure; connect communities to resources and opportunity; get us closer to net zero; tackle critical environmental challenges; protect people and the planet; and accelerate progress to make the world a cleaner, greener, safer place.
